notesStmt.note: The text given here as a 'second verse' for Pet could be a prosula? -- though the following doxology uses its tune

rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd Alb2 Evm Wcb Cdm Wor Pet

res.rBody:
Sancta et immaculata virginitas Sancta et immaculata virgo quibus te laudibus
efferam referam efferem nescio quia quem caeli capere non poterant
tuo gremio tuis gremiis contulisti

verses.vBody: Beata es virgo et gloriosa inter omnes mulieres et benedicta Gabriel haec dicens attulit affata pariea filium virgo intacta Jesus erit nomen eius cuncta per saecula hodie ex te Christus natus est in arua de te mater casta processit Maria ave speciosa in caelis regina et benedicta in aeternum

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd Alb2 Wcb Cdm Wor Pet

verses.vBody: Benedicta tu in mulieribus et benedictus fructus ventris tui
Virginibus beatior cunctis benedicta per aevum ex omni rationabili dicaris virgo

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd Alb2 Evm Wcb Cdm Wor Pet
